text: Beautiful station.  If there is a direct link between MRT station to Parkway Parade, it will be even better.
Nice and spacious new station, bike parking and bike sharing location is very hidden! It's underground between exit 1 and 2. Can find anywheel bikes there
The place is huge. For certain exits, you have to walk quite a bit. If there was an exit direct to Parkway, it would be a lot better.
I am sure LTA engaged Parkway Parade for direct link from MRT. Unfortunately it does not happen.
It's unique with offices on the left hand side entrance of the main door, with countless stores and food and beverages.
